ing: 1 (16 ounce) jar dill pickles, cut into strips lengthwise
des: "A quick finger food that everybody loves, and you can vary the meat according to your taste.  My friends like salami or corned beef best."
ins: Spread cream cheese over a meat slice to cover. Place a pickle piece on one end, and roll the meat up.  Repeat with remaining ingredients. Cut into 1 1/2 inch pieces, and chill until ready to serve.
